data.name: pyngham
data.description: Python library of the NGHam protocol

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

evidence: "The PyNGHam library is a Python version of the original NGHam protocol library" (described as a library, implying use as a dependency).
"This library is available in the PyPI repository, and can be installed with the following command: pip install pyngham" (distribution via PyPI package registry).
Repo owner is a GitHub user account "mgm8" and README presents it as a standalone library project, consistent with an individual maintainer rather than an institution or community.
